title: League of legends launcher wont work
body:
When i try to start the launcher it imediatly goes to a message saying that the launcher isn't working.
it does this every time without fail. can anyone help me with this?

replies.body:
The launcher can typically fail to run if League is missing certain system permissions. League interacts and relies on a lot of files outside of the League directory, therefore it requires specific administrative privileges in order to run correctly. As a first step in resolving this, I recommend working through the steps in our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to ensure League is configured to run properly.

Let me know if you have any questions.
